Text

Documentation and examples for text utilities.

Font family

Easily change the font family using .font-serif or .font-sans-serif.

Font Sans Serif

Font Serif

    
    <p class="h5 font-sans-serif">Font Sans Serif</p>
    <p class="font-serif">Font Serif</p>
